content: I want to focus on increasing engagement and building brand awareness. I'm active on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. I typically post a mix of photos, videos, and stories, mostly related to fitness and wellness. I'd like to post at least 3 times a week on Instagram and Facebook, and 5 times a week on Twitter. I've been doing pretty well with my fitness journey content, so I'd like to focus on that. I also have a few blog posts that I can repurpose. My audience seems to be most active during weekdays, especially in the morning.
